R1 + R2 + R3 + (R4 || (R5 + (R6 || (R7 || (R8 + (R9 || (R10 + R11)))))))

```{r}
p <- function(x, y) {
    (x * y) / (x + y)
}

r_1 <- 20
r_2 <- 30
r_3 <- 2
r_4 <- 5
r_5 <- 2
r_6 <- 3
r_7 <- 8
r_8 <- 4
r_9 <- 10
r_10 <- 5
r_11 <- 1

r <- p(r_9, r_10 + r_11)
r

r <- p(r_7, r_8 + r)
r

r <- r_5 + p(r_6, r)
r

r <- r_1 + r_2 + r_3 + p(r_4, r)
r
```
